messages.text:
I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
thanks.

LGTM On 18 October 2012 01:40, wrote: > Reviewers: r, adg, > > Message: > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > thanks. > > Description: > doc/go_spec: remove unnecessary lines. > > Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.com/6727048/ > > Affected files: > doc/go_spec.html > > > Index: doc/go_spec.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/go_spec.html > +++ b/doc/go_spec.html > @@ -1,6 +1,6 @@ > > > @@ -4738,8 +4738,6 @@ > (See also the section on handling panics.) >

> > -

> - > 
>  lock(l)
>  defer unlock(l)  // unlocking happens before surrounding function returns
>
>

Thanks. It seems like this has not yet been submitted. I applied the same change in pending CL 6710045. Feel free to abandon this CL. - gri On Wed, Oct 17, 2012 at 2:11 PM, Andrew Gerrand wrote: > LGTM > > On 18 October 2012 01:40, wrote: > > Reviewers: r, adg, > > > > Message: > > I'd like you to review this change to > > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > thanks. > > > > Description: > > doc/go_spec: remove unnecessary lines. > > > > Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.com/6727048/ > > > > Affected files: > > doc/go_spec.html > > > > > > Index: doc/go_spec.html > > =================================================================== > > --- a/doc/go_spec.html > > +++ b/doc/go_spec.html > > @@ -1,6 +1,6 @@ > > > > > > @@ -4738,8 +4738,6 @@ > > (See also the section on handling > panics.) > >

> > > > -

> > - > > 
> >  lock(l)
> >  defer unlock(l)  // unlocking happens before surrounding function
> returns
> >
